summary: Iteration 63 - Verified all 5 requested features: Backend doping_type filter (showcase/urgent), Frontend HomePage links, SearchPage doping URL handling, /ilan-ver routing, and ListingDetails page structure per PDF
context_for_next_testing_agent: P83 Iteration 63 - All homepage and ilan-ver features verified working. doping_type filter (showcase/urgent) correctly filters listings. /ilan-ver is now active route (not redirect). ListingDetails shows 8 sections per PDF spec.

backend_doping_showcase_filter.description: GET /api/v2/search?doping_type=showcase returns only is_featured=true listings (3 items found)

backend_doping_urgent_filter.description: GET /api/v2/search?doping_type=urgent returns only is_urgent=true listings (0 items currently)

frontend_home_acil_link.description: ACİL link on HomePage has href=/search?doping=urgent, clicking navigates correctly

frontend_home_vitrin_link.description: Tüm vitrin ilanlarını göster link has href=/search?doping=showcase

frontend_search_urgent_title.description: /search?doping=urgent shows title 'Acil İlanlar' and sends doping_type=urgent to API

frontend_search_showcase_title.description: /search?doping=showcase shows title 'Vitrin İlanları' with 3 results displaying Vitrin badges

routing_ilan_ver_active.description: /ilan-ver is now active route showing ListingCategorySelect page (not redirecting)

listing_details_campaign_cards.description: Section 7 shows 3 campaign cards: Bireysel Başlangıç (€9/7gün), Bireysel Plus (€19/15gün), Kurumsal Pro (€49/30gün)

listing_details_terms_checkbox.description: İlan verme kurallarını okudum checkbox present with Devam button

GET /api/v2/search?doping_type=showcase.response: Returns items with is_featured=true, 3 showcase listings found

GET /api/v2/search?doping_type=urgent.response: Returns items with is_urgent=true, 0 urgent listings currently

GET /api/categories?module=vehicle&count.response: Returns category list with translations and listing_count

GET /api/site/showcase-layout.response: Returns showcase config with homepage settings

homepage: ACİL (0) link visible with red dot indicator
Vitrin showcase grid displaying 3 items with Vitrin badges
Tüm vitrin ilanlarını göster link navigates to /search?doping=showcase
search_page_urgent: 0 sonuç bulundu - no urgent listings in system
search_page_showcase: 3 sonuç bulundu with Vitrin badges on cards
ilan_ver_category_select: Kategori Sütunları section with hierarchy display
ilan_ver_details: İlan Verme Formu title with PDF section structure
Sonraki Akış steps: Ön izleme, Doping, Admin onay
